ca.keefer.sanemethod.Entity
Class Talkable

java.lang.Object
  ca.keefer.sanemethod.Entity.AbstractEntity
      ca.keefer.sanemethod.Entity.Talkable
All Implemented Interfaces:
Entity
public class Talkable
extends AbstractEntity

This entity links into the common TextHandler object, and displays the contents on collision with this entity, enabling a player to view and choose text and options.

Author:
Christopher Keefer

Description copied from interface: Entity
